name: Digging Jim REMAKE
description:
Digging Jim with the original 100 caves in the original 1999 game.

You can make your own caves using the level editor!

Digging Jim is a puzzle game made by Persei Entertainment in 1999. Sadly, the game isn't compatible with modern computers. So I made a remake of it!

Help Jim traverse the underground caves of his home planet Akturien. Besides classic Boulder Dash elements such as rocks and diamonds, Digging Jim introduces new elements such as homing enemies, expanding wall and bombs.

UPDATES:

1.0.0.4 - Fixed path of some enemies so they travel correctly.

CAVE PACKS:

Get the Beginner Cave Pack here!

https://github.com/jasonm8197/...

DISCLAIMER: THIS IS A NON-PROFIT FAN GAME. DIGGING JIM IS OWNED BY PERSEI ENTERTAINMENT
